about_the_game:
Get 27+ new skins and ornaments in the last Cosmetic Pack of Anno 1800 and bid farewell to the End of an Era!

• Grab a back-row seat in the auditorium and enjoy a captivating performance on the musical stage.
• Watch the skies light up with breathtaking fireworks and enjoy the show!
• Step onto the dance floor and show off your moves to fellow residents or relax at the vibrant cocktail bar with a tasty annoholic beverage!
• Wander through illuminated tunnels and discover a different, dazzling side of your city with new radiantly glowing building skins!

Though this marks the end of the journey, the celebrations are just beginning. Join us for the ultimate Anno 1800 farewell!
detailed_description:
Get 27+ new skins and ornaments in the last Cosmetic Pack of Anno 1800 and bid farewell to the End of an Era!

• Grab a back-row seat in the auditorium and enjoy a captivating performance on the musical stage.
• Watch the skies light up with breathtaking fireworks and enjoy the show!
• Step onto the dance floor and show off your moves to fellow residents or relax at the vibrant cocktail bar with a tasty annoholic beverage!
• Wander through illuminated tunnels and discover a different, dazzling side of your city with new radiantly glowing building skins!

Though this marks the end of the journey, the celebrations are just beginning. Join us for the ultimate Anno 1800 farewell!

short_description: Celebrate the grand finale of Anno 1800 with the End of an Era pack! Transform your cities into the ultimate celebration space with over 27 festive new ornaments and skins!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
